name: Real Piano Teacher
description:
The number 1 piano app trusted by millions of piano learners and teachers worldwide. No experience! No Problem. Comes with midi support and allows you to connect to a real piano and get instant feedback when you hit the right or wrong keys. Don’t have a real piano? Don’t worry, you can use the in-built touch piano for an immersive experience. Lessons covers beginners to advanced with full offline audio lessons in various languages and accents.

Learn to play the piano with zero experience with the best entertainment and educational piano.

The interactive piano tutors assume you are a total beginner however this app is equally suited for intermediate and advanced musicians & pianists.
 Learn how to play the piano easily either with the in-built touch piano or a real piano keyboard.
Play any music, chord, melodies in this interactive app. The best piano for Android. You can play and record music in tons of fun games.
The app listens to every note you play and gives you instant feedback so you know if you hit the correct note at the right time. It also shows music notes as you see in real sheet music. All notes are perfectly synced with top songs and background music.

Play any song like a PRO without any practice. Real Piano Teacher is the best multi touch learning, gaming and freestyle piano for android. The best music app.

Lots of great features and modes including:

  ★★LEARNING MODE★★  

In learning mode, you can learn how to play the piano for free! Master each lesson in a fun and interactive way. Real Piano Teacher supports USB Midi Keyboard and supports standard general Midi protocol which allows the connection of a real physical piano or Midi keyboard such Yamaha, Casio etc or any real keyboard. By connecting to a physical midi keyboard, you can control, play, record and compete via the external MIDI keyboard

From playing single notes to complete pieces, this perfect piano helps you master sight-reading, technique, rhythm and playing with both hands to make sheet music come to life. Lessons include how to position your fingers on the piano, understanding the elements of the keyboard, groupings & naming of the various keys, notes for each position, staffs, clefs and chords. Then, you’re going to learn about notes, chords, play tons of amazing classical pieces, as well as contemporary hit songs on your own keyboard or the touch piano. After taking the lessons, you'll learn how to read notes, play while reading sheet music and play any song like a PRO.  

★★GAME MODE★★  

You will play fun games that are designed to train your relevant senses such as hand-coordination, musical hearing, sense of rhythm and many other skills. Compete with friends and family, break world records in the leader board. You can play the magic piano game with any song. Some pre-loaded songs include Twinkle little stars, Jingle Bells, Mozart, Beethoven, green sleeves, canon, merry Christmas, silent night, rap, disco, country music with this best piano game etc.

  ★★MAGIC KEYS and FREESTYLE★★

  Besides the game and learning mode. You can play and create freestyle music with this perfect piano. You can tap any key to play music in Magic keys mode. Get creative, record, & share with friends and family with the best android game. You can add beats to any song you compose and sync to cloud with this best piano app.

  OTHER GREAT FEATURES:
 • Fun and interactive tutor to teach you with audio and offline speech
• Piano Connect functionality – Connect with real piano for realistic experience 
• Gaming, Learning and Freestyle modes
 • Fast and Responsive • Best of studio sound quality (Realistic Sounds) 
• 8 Full Octaves (Key/Note Types) 
• Excellent Sampled Piano Sounds
 • Sound Record, audio record
• Share Recordings with friends & family


  Learn to play like a professional, beat friends & family in gaming mode, compose &create amazing freestyle music in the best interactive piano app & best music game for android.   Leave us a review :)
